column2: My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我的學位是有關英語教學的。要完成這個學位，裡面有些關於教學的課程也有些關於中英語文能力的訓練。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So you pursue for the English teaching mater degree; however there are still some further culture courses in that degree?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
是的，至少有三門課是跟文化和溝通相關的。
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
You used the tem culture, so what would the teacher give you as assignments in the course?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. To reach this goal and prove my competence, I have to show that I have a good command of Chinese. Therefore, many of my assignments were about Chinese-English sentence translation.
這門課的功課可能會因學生而異。像我自己的話，我來台灣然後想要找一個英語教學的教師職位，為了要達成這個目標然後顯現這個能力，所以我必須要有足夠的中文能力。因此我很多作業都是關於中英句子的翻譯。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

You mean that your goal is to teach English in Taiwan, so the course would ask you to proof your Chinese competence? Therefore, you had to complete some assignments and these assignments are about English and Chinese translation?
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
當然阿，而且我還需要磨練我的口說和寫作技巧
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
Okay, so you said that this message content was your assignment right?

Yes, I remember that sentence. When I got the Chinese sentences, I didn’t know how to say them in English. You know, some Chinese words can be very difficult for foreigners to recognize. I needed some help so I asked my colleague to help me. I told her to translate that sentence for me and sent me the answer.
對阿，我還記得那個句子是甚麼。當我看到一個中文句子的時候我可能會不知道如何用英文來表達。你也知道吧，中文字有些時候對於外國人來說很難辨認阿，所以我需要別人的幫助，所以我就問我同事，我請她幫我翻譯然後請她把答案以簡訊寫給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？
You mean that you ask your colleague this sentence in Chinese and she sent it back in English? Is this the situation? You mean that this message was just all about assignment?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
那則簡訊真的就只是作業答案而已啦。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？
Then, how about the contents in Document One from page 14 to 16? Please check these messages. Are they all for your assignments? Just because you want your colleague to answer you in English?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
對，它們的目的都相同，就只是要幫我完成作業而已。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
Then how about the adultery between you and 王彩燕 from you wife?

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. If she had been a bit more supportive, I would not have asked my colleague to help me. I think she should be blamed for all this misunderstanding.
對於這件事我太太真的是想太多了。我知道她對於我可以照顧家庭的能力不滿意。我想讓您知道的是，從我開始念學位開始，她都很不支持，她甚至一點都不想要幫助我完成學位。如果她多幫我一點忙的話，我也不用問我同事啦，我想她應該要為這樣的誤解負責。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？
According to your statement, you two don’t get along quite well?

At the beginning of our marriage, we did have some good time. But the problem is my employment. I tried teaching Portuguese in Taiwan but could not get stable teaching hours. Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
在婚姻初期我們是相處得滿愉快的。但她一直對我的工作有微詞。我也嘗試要教葡萄牙語來維生，但工作不穩定。所以我們有時候會為了這件事有口角，我們常為了這件事情不合，她都不相信我有努力找工作，我也很難讓她理解我有多沮喪和挫折。
好，那回到你剛剛所講的碩士課程。請問你碩士課程是什麼時候開始的，結束了嗎？你拿到學位了嗎？
Let’s go back to the mater degree you mentioned. When did you start your master degree? When did you end it? Did you receive the degree?

I first started the program in Spring 2010. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in December 2012. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我是在2010的春季開始上課。它是一個兩年的課程，我應該要在2012的12月完成這個學業，但是我並沒如期完成，因為我有一些兼職，還要寫作業，這樣有點困難。就想我先前說的，我太太不太支持我，所以我會覺得我自己在念書的時候好像只有一個人在奮鬥，所以我相當疲憊跟挫折。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
You mean that it’s two-year-long program and you didn’t finish it, why?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我無法達成每堂課的要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
When was(did) the last semester you registered end?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
我註冊的最後一個學期是2012年的秋季班。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

If what you said I is true, and the last semester of your registration ended on December 5th 2012; then after that you would not have to contact your colleague for the assignment right? However, you two, you and your colleague, had been contacting with each other for over six months after that.

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我可能真的無法完成學業，但並不代表我不想學習阿。雖然我無法完成學業，但我想持續精進中文，所以才會繼續和她聯絡。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
You mean that even that you didn’t complete your degree, you still want to sharpen your Chinese by your own?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
是的，這就是我繼續和我同事尋求協助的原因。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
Your colleague is just like your tutor right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不只是家教的角色她還是我真心的朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Did you pay her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我曾經有提過，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay her, why would she like to teach you Chinese so late at night, even it’s time for bed? Is it beyond the normal relationships between colleagues?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
我說過啦，她是一個很好的朋友，很支持我。她用她自己私人的時間來教我中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still teach at that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
是的，我還在那裏工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Does 王彩燕 also work there till now?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
她也還在那裏工作，但我們沒有再搭檔合作了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
Is there any person you want to subpoena or is there any evidence you want to investigate more?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。
I would like to subpoena 王彩燕 as a witness from 伯元cram school. I want her to describe their relationships and why she wrote that kind of messages.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
Plaintiff, is there any evidence that you want the court to investigate for you?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。
I heard that cram school has taken some actions for their relationships. Further, the cram school had tried to make 王彩燕 off. I don’t know if there is any possibility to proof this.
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

Defendant, is there any evidence that you want the court to investigate for you? Now the situation is that your program should end on December 5th 2012, and you should not use completing assignments as an excuse to contact 王彩燕. The text messages between you two almost happened after 9 p.m. It’s really easily to rouse people’s curiosity. Do you have any evidence that can help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我實在想不到有甚麼其他的證據了，誠如我之前所說的，我和我同事之間的簡訊互動真的很普通，我真的只是想要增進中文能力然後繼續學中文。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？
Then we set next court at 4:30 p.m. on June 9th 2014 for the witness procedure. Please both of you show up at that time. If it’s necessary, you two have the right to lawyer.
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我明白。
今天庭期到此結束。
Today’s court is adjourned.
今為 刑事庭 簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序
Today we are here for the preparation procedure of case of adultery, case number 2887.

今天我們進行外遇案件之準備程序。告訴人陳玉華提起這次的訴訟案件，主要是因為她的先生John Anderston跟所任職之補習班同事從往過密，且告訴人在其先生的手機簡訊記錄中查到一些親密訊息，再加上被告常常會藉故加班，或是深夜與其同事王彩燕進行視訊或其他方式之交談，因告訴人所蒐集之通訊內容已超過同事情誼，故提起此告訴。被告，你太太懷疑你有外遇，要告你通姦罪，你作何辯解？

Today we’re here for the preparation of adultery case.The plaintiff, Ms. Chen, sued the case.The main reason is that her husband is too intimate with his colleague at the cram school.The plaintiff found some messages from his colleague.besides, her husband always makes up reasons for staying late and even have conferencing with Wang zhia yen at night.The plaintiff thinks that the contents of her husband with his colleague Ms. Wang has over beyond colleagues relationship. As a result, she sued the case. Defendant, you wife sued you adultery. What’s your explanation?
Not guilty, of course.
我無罪
在今天的準備程序中，主要程序為詢問被告與其同事之通訊細節，目的是為了釐清是否被告與其同事實有外遇情事，足以構成通姦罪。雙方明白程序嗎？
In today’s preparation procedure, we would like to clarify the details of the defendant and Ms.Wang. We are to find whether their relationship can constitute adultery. Do both parties understand?
我明白
yes I understand.
I understand.
了解
先請問告訴人，你跟妳先生結婚多久了？有小孩嗎？
how long have you been married? You have kids?
我跟我先生已經結婚四年了，我們沒有小孩。
we have been married for four years. We don’t have children.
那你跟妳先生是在台灣結婚的嗎？還是在國外結婚的？
Did you two marry in Taiwan or abroad?
我跟我先生是在台灣認識的，四年前他剛來台灣，主要想要教葡萄牙文。
We met each other in Taiwan. 4 years ago, he came to Taiwan and he wanted to teach Portuguese.
那過去幾年，他在台灣的工作都是教葡萄牙文嗎？
in the past few years, he worked at Taiwan as a Portuguese teacher?
我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

When we first met, he was a Portuguese teacher.After we got married, he kept teaching Portuguese. However, Portuguese is not a very popular language to learn, his teaching hours was unstable.sometimes he did not have to work for a month.Later he wanted to teach English, in order to have stable teaching hours.But his mother tongue is not English, so he decides to seek an advanced degree.
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
You just mentioned he seek an advanced degree, you mean he want to get a degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No. He wanted to teach English in Taiwan, so he has to get the degree of English- teaching.He found a online learning program from California in the USA on the internet.He can learn English on the internet without going to the USA.After he finishes the program, he can get a master degree.His original plan is that after he gets the master degree, he can teach English in Taiwan as a professor.
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
What’s the relationship between he and the person he has affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
They are colleagues at the cram school.The cram school has an arrangement of a foreigner with a Chinese teacher. She’s his partner as a Chinese teacher.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
How come do you find out they have an affair?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

First, I noticed that my husband always stayed late at the cram school and worked.I asked him several times, it’s just a cram school, why did he have to do so many extra work?He told me that because he has to discuss many details with his partner.At first, I did not suspect him.But later I found that he always gets some calls after he came back.And, when he gets the calls, he talks in the study room. He never talks on the phone in front of me.So I checked his phone and I started to suspect him.
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Is there anything unusual in his cellphone?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。
In his phone book, there is always the same number.I was very curious and I checked his text message.After I checked, I found that she text the message with the woman every day.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不宜嗎？
It’s just text messages, I think it’s okay, is there any weird content inside?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If these are just usual messages, that’s okay. But he’s a married man, how can he let the other people to send him those intimate messages? I’ve already provided some messages to the court, they should be on the file.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Document number 1 page number 13. Defendant, please check the content of the text messages.Are these from your cell phone?
Yes, this is a message on my cell phone.
對 這些都是我手機裡的簡訊
那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國101年11月31日21點50分，由手機0958-932***發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

Now I would like to ask you some questions about these messages.The first message is sent at 9:50 pm. November, thirty-one, 2012.from the number 0958932.The content is: I really miss you, my love, what’s the meaning of this?

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
這是我同事傳的，我記得那時我請了兩天假，她有點擔心,所以她寄了那封簡訊給我她是在美國讀書的，所以思想很開放那就是她表答自己的方法，她平常都這樣講話，至於my love那個地方只是要表答我們在乎的人
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？
You mean the sender was educated in the USA, so she’s more opened?She’s more open-minded about expressing herself, so there’s nothing with the two words, my love?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
那就是只是彼此是好朋友會這樣說而已，沒什麼啊
那她前面那句呢？
What about the last sentence she mentioned?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.

So in the past few years, is his job teaching Portuguese?
我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

When we first met, he was a Portuguese teacher. After we got married, he continued teaching Portuguese. However, in Taiwan Portuguese is not that popular, so his teaching hours was not…teaching hours were not that stable. Sometimes he has periods between jobs for like…one or two months. After that, in order to get more stable income, he decided to start teaching English. However, his mother tongue is not English…he decided to seek an advanced degree.
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
You said that he was going to seek for an advanced degree, do you mean that he’s going to study a degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No. Because he hoped that he could teach English, he had to get a degree of teaching…English teaching. He found a distance learning program on the internet which is provided by California. In this case, he didn’t have to go to the United States. He only had to do online learning. After he got all the credits, he can get…master degree. His plan is that after he got this English teaching degree, he can teach English in Taiwan.
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
So what is his relationship with this person he has an affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
They are colleagues…in cram school…in the cram school he works for. The plan of the cram school is that foreign teacher partner with Chinese teacher, and that woman is his partner.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
How did you know that they committed…he committed adultery?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

In the beginning, I just found that he stayed at school to work extra hours. I asked him several times: it’s just an English cram school, what is the need of working extra hours? He told me that because he had to partner with the Chinese teacher, he had to spend much time to communicate…spend much time communicating. In the beginning, I didn’t doubt him at all. However, I found that he often had some phone calls after work. When he got the phone call, he would never talk in my presence, he would go to the study room. This…I doubt because of this, so I checked his cell phone.
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
What did you see in his cell phone then? Something unusual…anything unusual?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。

I often see the same number in his calling record, so I was quite curious and looked at his messages…checked his messages. After I checked his cell phones, I found that he messaged with this…with a woman every day.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不宜嗎？
What is big about sending messages? Is the content not appropriate?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If it’s something very usual, I won’t really care, but he’s a married man, how can he let the other one send messages which is a bit…vague? In the past, I have already provided some contents of the messages. They should be in the documents.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Please look at page 13 of the document. Here are some contents…here of the contents of the messages. Defendant, please take a look. Is these…are these the messages in your cell phone?
Yes, this is a message on my cell phone.
是的，是我簡訊的內容。
那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國101年11月31日21點50分，由手機0958-932***發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

So now I’m going to focus on the content of the messages…I’ll ask you some questions. The message is send by the phone number 0958-932*** in November 31st, 2012 at 9:50 PM. The content is “我非常想念你,”What does this mean?

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
就是我同事傳的啊。我記得那個時候我請了兩天假，她有點擔心。那就是為什…所以她才傳這樣的簡訊給我。我的同事是在美國受教育的，所以很開明…開放，那就是她講話的方式。就是…「my love」這樣的詞就只是我們叫我們關心的人的方式。
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？

You mean that this woman stayed abroad, so her thoughts are more westernized? And the way her…she expressed her feelings is more…open-minded? So the phrase “my love” doesn’t really mean anything, right?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對啊，那是好朋友之間，或是很關心彼此的朋友表達的方式…稱呼彼此的方式。
那她前面那句呢？
How about the previous sentence?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.
我就說了，她…她很關心我，我們是工作上的好夥伴。當我請假兩天，他很自然地就會想念我啊
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊，因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？
You mean that the woman sent you this message just because you took two days off? Because you didn’t…you weren’t there to help her in class, she missed you? Is that right?
Yes, that was the context. The message was no big deal
對啊，內容就是這樣子，根本沒什麼大不了的。
那第二封簡訊，是在中華民國102年1月13日23點55分，也是由同一個人的手機發送給你，訊息內容是「I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?」，請問這句話是什麼意思，為什麼會有這樣的內容呢？
So let’s look at the second message which is sent at 11:55 PM, January 13th, 2013 by the same person. 內容是我想要你在我身邊，我們什麼時候可以在一起？What does this mean? Why do you have that sentence in your cell phone?
She wrote me that message to tell me how to express a Chinese sentence in my assignment.
她寫那句話是想告訴我一句中文該怎麼說。
你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
You mean that she sent you this message because she was helping you finishing your homework. What does this mean?

As my wife has informed the court. I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
就像我妻子提到的，我現在正在修碩士課程。在那個學位中，我要修完三十個學分才能拿到學位。那我當然就要…完成一些練習、作業。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Can you please explain which program you are studying?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我的碩士課程是英語教學。這個課程主要就是英語教學，然後還會有一些文化語言…文化方面的東西還有語言能力等等。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So you’re studying for the TESOL program, so there are some cultural lessons in that program, is that true? Is that right?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
對，我記得至少有三門課是跟文化與溝通有關的。
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
So what kind of assignments do you have from these cultural communication course?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. To reach this goal and prove my competence, I have to show that I have a good command of Chinese. Therefore, many of my assignments were about Chinese-English sentence translation.
對每個學生來說，這堂課的作業都不太一樣。我以我自己來說的話，我是在台灣然後想要成為一位英文老師。為了要拿到這個學位、表示我有能力，我也要證明說我的中文是很好的。所以很多我作業的內容都是中英翻譯的句子。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

Do you mean that you plan to teach English in Taiwan, you have to prove that you have sufficient Chinese competence, is that right? So you have to finish some assignments in class, and these assignments are about translating sentences…between Chinese and English, right?
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
對啊，我也被要求就是要增進我的口語表達和寫作能力。
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
Let’s go back to the previous sentence. You said that they’re your assignments, right?

Yes, I remember that sentence. When I got the Chinese sentences, I didn’t know how to say them in English. You know, some Chinese words can be very difficult for foreigners to recognize. I needed some help so I asked my colleague to help me. I told her to translate that sentence for me and sent me the answer.
對啊，我記得那個句子。當我拿到這些…就是中文的句子的時候，我不知道英文怎麼講。你知道，有些中文字對外國人來說實在是太難了。我需要一些幫忙，所以請我的同事幫我。我請她翻譯一下那個句子，然後傳簡訊給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？

So you said that you didn’t know the meaning of that sentence, so you ask your colleague to send you the translation in English by message, is that right? So the content of the message is the answer of your assignment, right?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
對，那個就是我作業的答案。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？

So how about…let’s look at the content of the messages on page 14 to 16 on the document. Please check the content. Is these messages sent by your colleague because you need help doing your assignment?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
是的，所有的內容都是我要做作業所以傳的。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
So what do you want to say to your wife saying that you committed adultery with your colleague, Tsai-Yan Wang.

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. If she had been a bit more supportive, I would not have asked my colleague to help me. I think she should be blamed for all this misunderstanding.
我覺得她真的想太多了，關於這件事情。我知道她對我…對我照顧家庭的狀況不滿意。我想要讓法院知道的是，從我說我想要修這個學位開始，她就沒有提供任何的支持。她根本就不想要幫助我完成學位。如果她沒有這麼…如果她支持我的話，我就不會去尋求我同事的幫助。我覺得會產生這些誤會都是她的問題。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？
According to your words, the relationship between you two is a bit unpleasant, is that right?

At the beginning of our marriage, we did have some good time. But the problem is my employment. I tried teaching Portuguese in Taiwan but could not get stable teaching hours. Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
剛開始結婚的時候，確實相處得還不錯。但是問題就是…但是問題就是我的工作。我試著要在台灣教葡萄牙文，但是授課時數就是不夠。然後我們兩個的關係就是因為我的工作變得不太好。我們為了這件事情…常常為了這件事情爭吵。她不相信我已經盡我所能了。我沒有辦法讓他了解我的…有多沮喪然後遇到的困難是什麼。
好，那回到你剛剛所講的碩士課程。請問你碩士課程是什麼時候開始的，結束了嗎？你拿到學位了嗎？
OK, let’s go back to the master degree you were talking about. When did you start studying for your master degree. When did it end? Did you get the degree already?…Have you got the degree already?

I first started the program in Spring 2010. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in December 2012. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我本來是在2010年的春天開始的…一開始。那是兩年的課程。我本來是應該是在2012年的12月完成這個學位。我之所以沒有準時拿到是因為我要工作…然後沒有辦法有時間去寫我的作業。就像我剛剛說的，我的老婆一直都沒有很支持我。我覺得我根本就是一個人在追求這個學位，我覺得很累很沮喪。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
You said that this was a two-year program, and you didn’t finish it. Why is that?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我沒有辦法完成所有的課程…修完所有的課程。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
When did the semester you last registered ended?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
恩…是在2012月四月。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

So…as you said, according to your saying, the course ended on December 5th, 2012. After that…you won’t have…you didn’t really have assignments, right? But the messages between you and colleague continued until…continued for another six months. Why is that?

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我或許沒有想要把那個課程修完，但不代表我不想增進我的語言能力啊。就算我沒有修完那個學位，我還是想要增進我的中文能力，所以我開始自學。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
You mean that even though you haven’t finished your English, you still want to let your Chinese become more fluent, is that right?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
對，所以為什麼我請我同事幫忙。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
So this colleague is somehow like…a tutor of yours, right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不是只是一個家教而已，而且還是一個真正的好朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Did you pay her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我曾經要付錢給她，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay her, why does she send messages in the middle of the night with such effort? Is that beyond colleague…relationships between colleagues?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
所以我說這個朋友很支持我啊。她用她自己的時間幫助我學中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still teach English at that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
對，我還在那裡工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Is this woman, Tsai-Yan Wang your colleague, still working there?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
對啊，她還在那裡工作，但我們已經不是搭擋了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
Prosecutor, do you want to investigate any further evidence?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。

I hope to subpoena Wang…Tsai-Yan Wang, the colleague of the defendant, who works at Bo-Yuan Cram School. I hope that she can explain her relationship with the defendant and in what situation…under what circumstances are these messages sent.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
Defendant, do you…what other evidences do you want us to investigate?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

I heard that the cram school has taken some action concerning the relationship between them. And the cram school even asked the woman, Tsai-Yan Wang, to leave her job. Is it possible for…to check with the cram school about this matter?
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

Now, defendant, do you want to ask the court to investigate any evidence for you? The situation is…you have already completed…the courses have already been completed on December 5th, 2012. There…it is not acceptable that doing assignment is an excuse for Tsai-Yan Wang sending messages to you. Especially the time you send messages is always after 9 PM, that is quite doubtful. Do you have evidence which can help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我想不到任何法庭可以為我調查的證據。就像我說的，我們傳簡訊的原因非常簡單，我只是想要增進我的語言能力，然後繼續學中文。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？

So…the next court will be set at 4:30 PM, June 9th, 2014. We will inquire the witnesses. Plaintiff, defendant, both of you please come to the court. If it is necessary, you can both have lawyers, is that OK?
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我了解。
今天庭期到此結束。
OK, this will be the end of this preparatory procedure.
今為 刑事庭 簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序
Today we are here for the criminal court of the adultery case case number 2887 the preparation procedure

你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
So what you mean is that although you didn’t finish your masters courses, you wanted to improve your Mandarin on your own, is that right?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
對，這就是為什麼我找我同事幫我。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
Then the role your colleague takes is kind of like your tutor, is that right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不單只是我的家教，也是我真心的好朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Did you pay her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我有主動提出要給她錢，但她拒絕我了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay her, then why did she reply your text messages late at night when she supposedly should be asleep? Doesn’t this exceed what colleagues do to help each other?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
所以我才說她是一個很支持人的朋友。她犧牲她自己的時間來幫我學中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Are you still teaching English at that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
是，我還在那邊工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Is your coworker Tsai-Yen Wang still working there?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
她也正在那邊工作，但我們已經不是搭擋了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
Prosecutor, are there any witnesses you wish to subpoena or evidences you wish to show?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。

I wish to subpoena the defendant’s coworker Tsai-Yen wang from the cram school. I would like her to explain the relationship she has between her and the defendant, and her reason for sending the text messages.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
Plaintiff, are there any evidence that you wish for the court to investigate?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

I heard the cram school has taken some actions in response to the relationship between those two people. Somebody has tried to ask Tsai-Yen Wang to leave her position. I wonder if the cram school can… if there are any evidence to show this fact?
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

Now, the defendant, are there any evidence you wish for the court to help you investigate? The current situation is your degree courses have ended on December 5th 2012. Homework assignments is no excuse for the texting between you and Tsai-Yen Wang. Especially when your text messages are mainly sent after 9 PM at night. This arises suspicion. Do you have any evidence that may help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我想不到任何證據可以請法院幫我調查的。就像我之前提到的，我和我同事往來的原因其實很簡單：我只想讓我的中文進步，然後不斷地練習中文而已。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？

The next…witness… the next court for the case will be on June 9th 2014, 4:30PM. The plaintiff and the defendant are required to come to court in person. If it is necessary, you can all appoint lawyers, do you understand?
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我明白。
今天庭期到此結束。
OK, our court ends here.
今為 刑事庭 簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序
Today we’re here for the preparatory procedure of the adultery case, case number 888.
通譯宣讀 「通譯結文：今為貴院簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序為通譯，謹當為公正誠實之譯述，此結，通譯○○○，中華民國103年5月27日。」

2.你有權選任法定辯護人，若為低收入戶、中低收入戶、原住民或其他符合法律規定之資格，得請求法律服務。

被告是否了解以上權利？
Do you fully understand you rights?
I understand.
了解
今天我們進行外遇案件之準備程序。告訴人陳玉華提起這次的訴訟案件，主要是因為她的先生John Anderston跟所任職之補習班同事從往過密，且告訴人在其先生的手機簡訊記錄中查到一些親密訊息，再加上被告常常會藉故加班，或是深夜與其同事王彩燕進行視訊或其他方式之交談，因告訴人所蒐集之通訊內容已超過同事情誼，故提起此告訴。被告，你太太懷疑你有外遇，要告你通姦罪，你作何辯解？

Today, we’re here for the preparatory procedure of the adultery case. Yu-Hua Chen filed this case. The main reason is that her husband, John Anderson sent intimate messages to his colleague working at the cram school. The person who filed this case checked the messages of her husband and found some intimate messages. Moreover, the defendant would make up some reasons, umm..for example, to have extra working hours in order to teleconference with his colleague, Tsai-Yen Wang. The intimate messages the plaintiff has found out were beyond coworker’s relationship. Therefore, the plaintiff decided to file this case. Defendant, you have violated the adultery, what is your plea?
Not guilty, of course.
當然無罪啊
在今天的準備程序中，主要程序為詢問被告與其同事之通訊細節，目的是為了釐清是否被告與其同事實有外遇情事，足以構成通姦罪。雙方明白程序嗎？

In today’s preparatory procedure, our main goal is to ask for the details of the intimate messages sent between the defendant and his colleague, so that we can confirm whether the defendant and his colleague do constitute adultery. Do both parties understand our procedure?
我明白
Yes.
I understand.
明白
先請問告訴人，你跟妳先生結婚多久了？有小孩嗎？
First, plaintiff, how long have you been married to your husband? Do you two have any children?
我跟我先生已經結婚四年了，我們沒有小孩。
We’ve been married for four years, and we do not have any children.
那你跟妳先生是在台灣結婚的嗎？還是在國外結婚的？
Were you married in Taiwan or in a foreign country?
我跟我先生是在台灣認識的，四年前他剛來台灣，主要想要教葡萄牙文。
I met my husband in Taiwan. Four years ago, he came to Taiwan in order to teach Portuguese.
那過去幾年，他在台灣的工作都是教葡萄牙文嗎？
Then for the past few years, has his work always been teaching Portuguese?
我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

When we first met, he was a Portuguese teacher, and after we got married, he was still teaching Portuguese. However, among Taiwanese, Portuguese is not a very prevalent and famous language. Therefore, his teaching hours are not too many. Sometimes, he even had a period between a month or two between jobs. Afterwards, in order to have a more stable income, he decided to teach English. However, his mother tongue is not English; therefore, he decided to learn English and seek an advanced degree.
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
What you mean by “seeking an advanced degree” is that he planned to pursue a higher degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No. He hopes to teach English in Taiwan; therefore, he needs to receive a degree which is related to English TESOL, and he found a distance learning program which is launched in California. Through this distance learning program, he’s able to learn online without flying to America. Therefore, after receiving the credits, he will be able to receive a master’s degree. His plan was that through getting this master’s degree, he will be able to teach English in Taiwan.
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
Then I would like to ask what is the true relationship between his and the person who he had an affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
Well, they are colleagues at the cram school. At the cram school, the woman was partnered with my husband, and the woman was a Chinese teacher, and my husband an English teacher.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
Then how can you proof that they did have an affair?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

Well, at the beginning, I just noticed my husband often worked for longer hours at the cram school. And I asked him many times about how come? It was just a cram school! There’s no need, no way to have longer working hours. He told me that he needed to discuss about teaching matters and communicate with his Chinese partner. Therefore, at the beginning, I didn’t doubt him at all. But afterwards, I’ve found out that he will often receive calls after work. The strange this was, when he was answering these calls, he would just go back to his study room and answer the calls instead of answering them in front of me. Therefore, this made me very skeptical of him, and I checked his mobile phone.
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Then did you find anything wrong or anything strange?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。

Well, I’ve found out that one number appeared very, very often in his cell phone record. Therefore, I was so curious that I checked his instant messages. Then, I found out that he sent messages with a woman nearly every day.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不宜嗎？
It’s just merely messages. How about the content? Are they unusual or intimate?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If they were just normal messages, then I’m okay with that. However, he is married to me, how can he allow that woman to send him such intimate messages? I provided some content of the messages to the court earlier. I believe they’re in the folder.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Let’s look at evidence one, page thirteen. Defendant, please take a look at some of the messages here. Were these messages the same with the messages in your cell phone?
Yes, this is a message on my cell phone.
是的。一模一樣。
那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國101年11月31日21點50分，由手機0958-932***發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

Then I would ask you some questions according to these messages. The first message appears to be sent by someone, whose number was 0958932, at 9 pm, November 31, 2012, and the content was, I really miss you, my love.” What does this mean?

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
喔，那是我同事發給我的啊。我記得我那時候請假，請了兩天。她那時很擔心我吧。那就是為甚麼她會發那一封訊息給我。而且她是在美國長大、受教育的，所以她是一個非常開放的女生。那就是她講話的方式和表達的方式啊。至於「我的愛」，只是互相叫對方會用的辭啊，並沒有代表甚麼意思。
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？

Okay, so do you mean that the person who sent this message to you was westernized because she was educated in the US? Therefore, she was very open with her feelings, and the word “my love” doesn’t mean anything, is that right?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對啊，當然沒有意思啊， 因為那只是親密的朋友或好朋友之間的稱呼而以。
那她前面那句呢？
Then how about the previous sentence that she sent?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.
我剛剛已經提到了，她那時候非常擔心我，而且我們是工作夥伴! 我兩天沒去工做啊，她當然會想我啊!
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊，因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？

Okay, what you mean is, because you haven’t been to work for two days; therefore you colleague missed you and was worried about you? Moreover, without your assistance, she missed you? Was that merely the reason?
Yes, that was the context. The message was no big deal
對啊，內容就是這樣子，所以我的那一封訊息根本不算甚麼啊!
那第二封簡訊，是在中華民國102年1月13日23點55分，也是由同一個人的手機發送給你，訊息內容是「I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?」，請問這句話是什麼意思，為什麼會有這樣的內容呢？

Okay, let’s look at the second message, sent by the same person at 11:55 pm, January 13, 2013. The content was, “I want you by my side, when will we be together?” So what did this sentence mean? Why did this person want to send you this sort of content?
She wrote me that message to tell me how to express a Chinese sentence in my assignment.
因為她要教我如何用中文表達這一種內容。
你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
Oh, so you mean she sent you this message in order to teach you, assist you, explain to you how to translate sentences? What does this mean?

As my wife has informed the court. I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
就像我太太跟庭上說的，我正在攻讀碩士學位。要順利拿到學位，我必須拿到30學分。當然是要做一些作業、一些練習啊。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Please explain clearly to me, what were you studying for concerning your master’s program?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
就是英語教學的碩士學位啊。在學位裡面，還有分英語教學的課程、文化的課程、和交流的課程。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So you mean that this master’s degree was mainly about English teaching; however, you are also studying about culture interaction, right?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
對，至少有三門課是跟文化交流、溝通相關的。
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
So what sort of assignment will be assigned in these courses?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. To reach this goal and prove my competence, I have to show that I have a good command of Chinese. Therefore, many of my assignments were about Chinese-English sentence translation.
每個人所被分配到的作業不一樣。因為我现在在台灣，希望找到一份英語教學的工作。因此，為了達成這個目標，我必須能證明我有足夠的中文能力。因此我有很多作業都是有關中英字句的翻譯。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

So you mean that because you planned to teach English in Taiwan; therefore, this master’s degree will be able to proof that you have enough Chinese language competence? Therefore, you have the finish the assignments being assigned in these courses, and the assignments include Chinese and English sentence translation?
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
對沒錯，而且我有必須加強我口說和寫作能力。
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
Okay, then let’s start again. You said that this was your assignment, right?

Yes, I remember that sentence. When I got the Chinese sentences, I didn’t know how to say them in English. You know, some Chinese words can be very difficult for foreigners to recognize. I needed some help so I asked my colleague to help me. I told her to translate that sentence for me and sent me the answer.
對，我記得。當我拿到那一份作業的時候，我不知道它是甚麼意思。而且你知道，對有些外國人來說，有些中文字句非常難懂。因此，我非常需要幫助，所以我就問了我的同事啊。我請她幫我翻那一句話，然後透過簡訊傳給我答案。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？

Okay, so what you mean was that at that time, you first sent the Chinese version of that sentence, and she helped you translate it and sent you that sentence in English? Is that right? And that means this message was just the answer to your assignment?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
沒錯，只是作業的答案。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？

Okay, then let’s take a look at evidence one, page 14 to 16, and let’s take a look at all the content of all the messages. Please, just take a look at these contents. And the main reason was, because you want to finish your assignment, and you asked your colleague to translate them for you?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
沒錯，所有的訊息都是因為我要完成我的作業，拿到答案，所以才會有這些訊息。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
Then how about your wife filing the adultery case against you and your colleague Ms. Tsai-Yen Wang?

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. 那過去幾年，他在台灣的工作都是教葡萄牙文嗎？

我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
You just mentioned that he decided to seek an advanced degree. Do you mean that he would like to pursue a degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
What is the relationship between your husband and the person he has an affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
The cram school partner a foreign teacher with a Chinese teacher for teaching, and that woman is his teaching partner.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？

一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

At the beginning, I just noticed that my husband often worked overtime at the cram school. I have asked him several times. Why does he have to work overtime at a cram school? He told me that because he had to partner with a Chinese teacher for teaching, many details have to be discussed. 一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，I truly had no doubts on his saying at first. 在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Do you find anything unusual in his cellphone?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。
I often saw a certain set of numbers in the records of his phone book, so I checked his messages out of curiosity. Then I found that he has texted with a woman almost every single day.

Is it actually all right with texting messages, right? Is the content very inappropriate?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If they are common messages, it is fine. However, he is married. How could that woman always send him some intimate sentences? Earlier on, I have provided the court with some contents of their messages. They should be in the file.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Please show the file one, page 13. There are some contents of several messages. The defendant, please verify whether the messages are from your cellphone?

那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國101年11月31日21點50分，由手機0958-932***發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

I have some questions for you based on these messages. The first message was sent at 9:50 at night on November 31st in 2012 from the number 0958932 and so on. The content said that “I really miss you, my love.”What does that mean?

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
這的確是我同事傳的簡訊。她只是關心我、擔心我，所以發簡訊給我。我同事在美國受教育的，她思想很西化，這就是她說話、表達情感的方式。至於「我的愛」一詞，這只是對我們關心的人的稱呼而已。
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？
You said that the sender was educated abroad, so her thoughts are quite westernised, and the way she expresses herself is more open, so the word “my love”does not carry any special meaning, right?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對，這只是一種普遍稱呼好朋友和關心的人的方式而已。
那她前面那句呢？
And the sentence in front?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.
像我說的，她只是關心我，我們是工作夥伴。當我休假兩天的時候，她當然會想我。
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊，因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？
Do you mean that because you were off for two days, she sent you such a message, and because without your assistance in the courses, she missed you so much? Is that it?
Yes, that was the context. The message was no big deal
這就是簡訊內容，並沒有什麼特別的。
那第二封簡訊，是在中華民國102年1月13日23點55分，也是由同一個人的手機發送給你，訊息內容是「I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?」，請問這句話是什麼意思，為什麼會有這樣的內容呢？

And the second message was sent at 11:55 at night on January 13th, 2013 via the same phone number. The content was that “I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?”What does that mean? Why did the sender text you such a message?
She wrote me that message to tell me how to express a Chinese sentence in my assignment.
她只是告訴我作業中的一句中文怎麼寫而已。
你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
Do you mean that she sent you this message only for helping you complete your assignment? What does that mean?

As my wife has informed the court. I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
像我太太剛剛告訴法院的，我在修一個碩士課程。課程中，我必須完成三十個學分才能拿到學位。我當然必須完成一些作業和習題。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Could you elaborate    what you exactly study for your master’s degree?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我修的是英語教學，有些課和英語教學有關，有些跟文化和語言能力有關。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So you study a master program on TESOL, and some courses are related to culture communications, right?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
是的，我記得至少有三門課和文化溝通有關
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. 這些文化溝通課程的作業因學生而異。以我自己為例。我住在台灣，想要找到教英文的工作。為了達成這個目標，並精進語文能力，我必須有好的中文能力。因此，我有很多作業跟中英翻譯有關。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

Do you mean that because you planned to teach English in Taiwan, this program requires you to prove you have a certain level of Chinese ability? And therefore, you have to complete some assignments give by the courses, which is sentence translation? Is that right?
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
對的，我當然必須精進我的口說和寫作能力。
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
All right, let’s go back to that sentence. You said that was your assignment, right?

是的，我記得這個句子。我剛開始不知道那些中文句子用英文該怎麼說。有些中文字對外國人來說很難認。我需要一些協助，所以請同事幫我。我請她幫我翻譯句子，用簡訊傳給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？

Do you mean that you asked your colleague how to say that sentence in Chinese, and she texted you the answer? Is that the scenario? In other words, the content of the message is only the answer to the assignment, right?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
簡訊內容就是我的作業答案。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？

Then please show the contents of all the messages on page 14 to page 16 in the file one. Please verify the messages. Is it because that you has to do your assignments and ask for help from your colleague, asking her to send you messages?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
是的，所有簡訊都是為了幫助我完成作業。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
Your wife just said that you have an affair with your colleague, 王彩燕, what is your explanation?

我太太真的想太多了！我想她只是不滿意我賺錢的能力。我想告訴庭上，我太太從一開始就完全不支持我念碩士，她並不願意幫助我完成學業。如果她願意支持我一點點，我不會請同事幫忙。我覺得她自己應該為這誤解負責。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？

剛結婚的時候，我們的確渡過了一段美好時光，但是問題出在我的工作。我想要在台灣教葡萄牙文，但是授課時數很不穩定，所以我的工作就成了我們之間的問題。我們常常為這個問題吵架。她不相信我已經盡力了，我也無法讓她理解我遇到的挫折和困難。

我的碩士課程從2010年春天開始，是兩年的課程，應該要在2012年12月完成課程。但是我沒有完成課程，因為我有兼差，沒有時間完成我的課程作業。像我說的，我太太並不支持我。我覺得是自己一路單獨奮鬥，感覺很累、很有挫折。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
Do you mean that the program should have lasted for two years, but you did not complete it, and why?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我無法完成所有的課程要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
What did it end, the last semester that you registered?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
我註冊的最後一個學期是在2012年秋季。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

Do you mean that even though  you failed to complete the master program, you still want to sharpen your Chinese ability and make your Chinese more fluent, right?

是，我請同事幫忙。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？

她不僅是個家教，也是我真正的好友。

沒有，我想要付她錢，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？

因此我認為她是非常支持我的，她用自己的時間幫助我學習中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still work as an English teacher at that cram school now?
Yes, I am still working there.
是的，我還在那裡工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？

她也還在那裡工作，但我們不再是工作夥伴了。

我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

You have the right to a lawyer. If you come from a low-income family, a medium-and-low income family, or if you are an aborigine or meet other qualification set by the law, you may ask the court for legal assistance.
3.你有權請法院調查任何對你有利的證據。
You have the right to ask the court to investigate any evidence favorable to your case.

被告因妨害名譽案件被檢察官起訴，起因是被告涉嫌在中華民國108年12月1日到109年1月20日之間，在網際網路論壇，名為Foreign Land (外國園地)，發表一連串的評論，雖此論壇之主要目的是提供在台居留外國人士交流之平台，但被告卻利用這樣一個平台進行對告訴人公司之批評，致使告訴人公司名譽受損。對此妨害名譽之告訴，有何辯解？

This incident happened on December 1, 2019 to January 20, 2020. The accused post the comments on the internet chat forum, Foreign Land, which provides foreigners in Taiwan to communicate with others. However, the accused used this platform to criticize the accuser’s company, which damaged the accuser’s company reputation, so the accused was prosecuted. What’s your plea?
I plead not guilty.
我沒有罪。
請問你知道「外國園地」這個論壇嗎？
The defendant, do you know the Internet forum, Foreign Land
Yes, Foreign Land is a forum very popular among foreigners.
我知道這個Foreign Land非常受歡迎，尤其是在外國人當中。
可以簡要的描述你在這個平台上的活動嗎？
Can you summarize your activities on Foreign Land?
I am a registered member, which means I can read others’ posts and post articles for others to read.
我是有註冊的會員，我可以看到別人發表的文章，同時也可以發表自己的文章給別人看。
你常常在上面發表文章嗎，可以大概抓個頻率嗎，大概多久發表一篇文章？
How often you post comments on the Foreign Land? ...
I won’t say I regularly post articles on Foreign Land. I only have postings when I want to share some concerns or vent my feelings.
我不會說我常常在上面發文，我只有在我有一些疑慮，還有想要發洩一些情緒的時候才會在上面發文。
提示偵券(一)65頁。這一頁是取自中華民國108年12月13日在「外國園地」中發表的內容。請你看一下，這是你寫的嗎？
… The page is about your comments on Foreign Land on December 13, 2019. Please take a look. Are these your posts?
It seems to be my posting but it was posted some time ago, I am not sure if the article is in its entirety.
我有發表這個文章，但是是在很久之前發表的，所以我不確定文章的完整性。
你在文中所提到的主要內容為何？請陳述。
Please describe the main content
As you can see from the copy, I posted some concerns and questions regarding Winwin company, especially about how foreigners were treated by that company.
…我在上面發表了我的疑慮、對公司的一些問題，還有他們怎麼對待外國員工。
你剛剛講到的某一公司，請問有在任何一篇文章當中，明確指出該公司的全名嗎？
You mentioned the full name of the company. Did you point out its name in any comments?
Yes, I am sure I have used the company’s full name, Winwin.
我確定我有在上面用公司的全名，贏贏。
你在65頁的內容中，提到該公司常常在雇用外國人時，沒有照勞基法的規定提供基本工時、工資、福利，更不時有未幫外國人申請工作簽證的情況。請問，你這樣講，有證據嗎？

In Page 65, you mentioned this company hired foreign employee without following Labor Basic Law about work time, basic wage and benefits. The company didn’t help foreigners apply for working visa. For this, do you have any evidence?

I did mention those issues. I did not have evidence. I heard those issues from some other foreign friends who either worked for that company or had experiences with that company. As a result, I expressed my concerns in the question format, meaning I asked all those questions regarding working hours, basic salary, benefits and ARC application with the hope that Winwin would come forward to respond to my questions.
我有講過這個問題，但我沒有證據。我是從我一些在那個公司工作的朋友或是在那邊有經驗的朋友聽來的。我有在論壇發表一些問題，包含了工作時數、基本薪資、福利，還有是否幫員工申請居留簽證…。
你的意思是說，你是從其他外國朋友那邊聽到這些細節，但不是本人的第一手資料，是嗎？
You mean that you heard from you friends, but it isn’t your first-hand information, right?
True. I heard those details from other friends, also the registered members of Foreign Land.
沒錯，我是從朋友還有一些註冊會員那邊聽到這些小細節的。
那你怎麼可以在一個公開的論壇中，直接把聽來的東西，就做了轉述呢？
How could you repost this information on Foreign Land?

I didn’t quote others and post the concerns as accusations. Instead, all my comments were questions. I was hoping Winwin would provide some sort of clarifications so that the foreign community would not hold any wrong ideas against that company.
我沒有直接引用，我只是發表言論、提出我的問題。我只是希望贏贏公司可以釐清這些問題，讓外國人不會對這家公司有誤解。
什麼叫做你都是用問題的方式來進行批評？可以解釋一下嗎？
What do you mean that you criticize in questions? Can you explain it?
For example, I asked in one posting “Is it true that Winwin sometimes does not help foreign employees to apply for an ARC, the legal working permit they need for working in Taiwan legally?”.
舉例來說，我發表了一個問題，就是那個公司有沒有幫外國人申請居留證，外國人可以合法居留嗎?
所以你發表這一系列文章的目的只是為了釐清所謂的「真相」，是嗎？
So, you posted a series of comments just in order to find out the truth?
Yes, I only wanted to get some clarifications or explanations. However, instead of responding to my questions directly, Winwin chose to file this lawsuit against me.
是的，我只是想要得到一些澄清和解釋。然而，這個公司沒有直接回答我的問題，而是對我提出告訴。
雖然告訴人有提供他們自外國園地抓下來文章內容，但他們也告訴檢方，這些內容並不完整。所以就你記憶所及，你大概連續發表了幾篇呢？
Although the accuser provided some comments from Foreign Land and told the police, but the content wasn’t entire. …

As I stated before, it has been some time already. I cannot recall exactly how many articles I posted on Foreign Land, perhaps eight to ten? The problem is when this lawsuit began, the administrator of Foreign Land decided to delete my postings to avoid trouble.
我之前說過的，那些文章已經發表一段時間了，所以我不能明確告訴你我發了多少文章到論壇，也許是8到10篇。問題是當他們提出告訴後，版主就把我的文章全部刪除，以免造成麻煩。
你的意思是說當這個訴訟開始進行的時候，那個論壇的版主就進行了刪文的動作嗎？
You mean when the lawsuit began, the administrator of the forum deleted all of your posts, right?
Yes, that is correct.
是這樣沒錯。
也就是說，你完全沒有辦法確定你一共為此事件發表過幾篇文章？
That is, you can’t assure how many comments you posted, right?
That’s correct, too.
這樣也沒錯。
那就你記憶所及，你曾經接到過該公司任何希望你停止批評他們的要求嗎？你有照做嗎？
Did you remember that the company asked you to stop criticizing? Did you stop posting comments?
I think towards the end of my postings, I did get a request from Winwin, asking me to stop posting articles about their company. I didn’t stop immediately because, again, I was only asking questions.
我認為如果要我停止發文的話，我應該會收到一些叫我停止發文的請求，我沒有立即停止，因為就像我前面所說的，我只是問問題而已。
所以你還是堅持，因為你都是用問題的方式來發表評論，並沒有直接毀謗該公司名譽的事實，是嗎？
So, you mean you insist on posting comments in question, but not libeling the company, right?
It was never my intention to defame Winwin. I don’t quite understand how a series of questions could possibly constitute “defamation.”
我從來都不是故意要毀謗這個公司，我不懂為什麼問問題會造成毀謗。
那請問告訴人，貴公司是什麼時候開始瞭解到，在「外國園地」當中，有關於貴公司的文章？
Now, I’m going to ask accuser some questions. Accuser, when do you realize that some comments are posted on Foreign Land about your company?

This issue first came to our attention around December 2019. My wife and I personally were not active in that kind of forums. We were only informed by some friends about the malicious comments on Foreign Land until then.
我第一次知道此事是在2019年12月。我和我老婆在這樣的論壇並不活躍。我們是在那時才被朋友告知有這些惡意評論。
對於剛剛被告表示他只是提出一連串的問題，希望貴公司回答這些問題，並沒有以陳述方式毀謗貴公司的名譽。你有何意見？
According to the accused, he just posted a series of questions and hoped that the company can respond to him. He didn’t say something directly to defame your company. Did you have any opinion?

That’s not true. In English, even when comments are made in the question format, they still carry enough force to make readers wonder or question the facts implied by the questions. Even when the defendant said he only asked questions, damage was done to my company.
這不是事實。在英文表達中，即使用問題方式評論，也能讓閱讀的人產生好奇或質疑事實。即使被告說他只是問問題，也足以毀謗我的公司。
你的意思是說，不管對方是否用問題方式提出質疑，你們公司的名譽實際上都有所損害嗎？請解釋一下。
Do you meant that whether the other party posted the questions, the company has been defamed? Can you explain?

Yes, when the defendant asked those questions, it caused doubt and suspicion in the circle of foreigners in Taiwan. Foreigners form their own circle here in Taiwan and rumors travel fast. That’s why even the Labor Bureau paid several visits to our company, trying to find out if we were involved in the matters posted on Foreign Land.
是的。當被告問了這些問題，就能讓這些住在台灣的外國人懷疑這間公司。這些外國人在這個論壇裡自成一圈。在這圈子裡，謠言傳得非常快。這就是爲什麼勞工局多次造訪我的公司，來看這些評論中的問題是否真的存在。
那勞工局前往貴公司瞭解外國人的雇用狀況，以及居留證的申請細節，有發現什麼不符合的地方嗎？
When the Labor Bureau went to the company to understand the situation of hiring the foreigner and their application of ARC, did anything happen which didn’t meet the requirements?
No, the representatives from the Bureau came but did not find anything wrong with our company or our hiring practice.
沒有，勞工局派的代表並沒有查到任何不符規定的事。
如果勞工局的調查並沒有發現什麼不妥之處，或是違法之處，再加上剛剛被告也解釋，他撰寫這些文章的目的都只是希望貴公司能夠進行自清的動作，有沒有可能雙方進行和解呢？

If the Labor Bureau didn’t find anything which is illegal or not appropriate, just like the accused explained that he wrote these articles only to hope that the company can clarify, can both parties consider settlement?

We previously tried but failed to reach any conclusion. I would only consider settling this case with two things from the defendant. First, he has to formally apologize to Winwin for posting those inappropriate comments on Foreign Land. Second, as he said he heard all those details from “other foreign friends,” he should provide the names of those people to clear his own name.
我們之前有試著調解，但失敗了。我可以考慮和解，但對被告有兩件事的要求。第一，他必須為他不妥言論，正式向我的公司道歉。第二，如他剛才所說他是從其他外國朋友中聽到這些消息，他必須提供這些朋友的全名
被告，就像剛剛告訴人所指出，如果要進行和解，他希望由你這邊採取兩個行動，第一，正式道歉，對於在外國園地所發表的文章，不論你的文章是否造成告訴人公司實質上的名譽受損，對方都希望你提出道歉。第二，你剛剛前面指出，你是從一些外國友人那邊，聽到告訴人公司有違法對待外國勞工之嫌，你可以提供這些友人的姓名嗎？

The accused, just like accuser said, if you want a settlement, you need to take two actions. First, you need to apologize formally. The company treated the employees illegally. Can you provide the names of your friends?

No, I would not consider these terms. First of all, I don’t know why I should apologize for posting some questions on the Internet. Since when is asking questions a crime? Second, Winwin cannot agree to settle the case with the term of obtaining names from me. This is not right.
不，我拒絕接受這些條件。第一點，我不懂為什麼我要為這些言論道歉，什麼時候問問題也犯法？第二，他不應該要我公開這些外國朋友的全名。
如果被告堅持因為文章的書寫內容都是以問題的方式進行，並沒有要毀謗告訴人公司的意圖，這顯然在第一個部分，你就是拒絕道歉，是嗎？
The accused, you insist that you wrote the comments in questions, and you didn’t intend to defame the company, so you won’t apologize, right?

對，我拒絕道歉。
對於告訴人的第二個要求，你也拒絕。是因為擔心告訴人公司會對那些人進行相關的法律訴訟，是嗎？

我擔心那些曾在那邊工作或是目前在那工作的朋友受害。我怎麼可以出賣這些朋友，就因為我想達成和解？為什麼他們要遭到這些傷害？
如果雙方無法就和解進行任何退讓，那麼法院這邊只能將這一次的準備程序內容進行彙整，以便進行下一次的審理程序。雙方的辯護人，是不是能夠針對和解這個選擇，再跟你們的當事人談一談呢？

The accuser, if both parties cannot reach a settlement, the court will collect the details for preparatory procedure and have next trial procedure. Today both parties have their lawyers. The lawyers of both parties, can you negotiate with your clients about settlement?
報告庭上，其實之前我們就有跟被告溝通，既然他說他的消息都是聽自其他友人，他大可以直接把那些人的名字提供給我們，而讓這一次的訴訟事件告一段落，但被告的態度一直很不合作，所以我們這邊也就無法進行進一步的和解動作。

Dear judge, I am the lawyer of the accuser. We used to negotiate with the defendant. The defendant said he heard information from his friends. He can provide their full names, so this case will be dismissed here. However, the defendant didn’t want to cooperate so we couldn’t reach an agreement.
報告鈞院，其實我的當事人會有這樣的顧慮，最主要是因為告訴人公司雇用很多外國人士，我的當事人不希望因為提供友人姓名一事，而讓過去或目前為告訴人公司服務的外國人士，惹上不必要的麻煩。望請鈞院了解。

Dear judge, I am the lawyer of the accused. The reason why my client has these concerns is because the accuser’s company applies many foreign employees. My client doesn’t want to provide the names of his foreign friends because he doesn’t want his friends to get into trouble. Hope you can understand.
既然告訴人跟被告雙方對於和解都各自有堅持，本庭定中華民國109年8月14日上午11點整進行審理程序。
Because both parties don’t reach a settlement, so the date of the trial procedure will set at 11 a.m. on August 14, 2020.

舉例來說，我曾在一篇貼文問說，雙贏公司是否真的沒有幫助外國人申請居留證，也就是他們可以合法在台工作的權利。
所以你發表這一系列文章的目的只是為了釐清所謂的「真相」，是嗎？
So your purposes of this post are finding out the truth, right?
Yes, I only wanted to get some clarifications or explanations. However, instead of responding to my questions directly, Winwin chose to file this lawsuit against me.
是的，我只想要得到他們的澄清或解釋。然而，他們並沒有直接的回應我，雙贏公司選擇了控告我的方式。
雖然告訴人有提供他們自外國園地抓下來文章內容，但他們也告訴檢方，這些內容並不完整。所以就你記憶所及，你大概連續發表了幾篇呢？
Although the accuser provide some articles contents, they have informed that these informations are not complete. How many post have you posts?

As I stated before, it has been some time already. I cannot recall exactly how many articles I posted on Foreign Land, perhaps eight to ten? The problem is when this lawsuit began, the administrator of Foreign Land decided to delete my postings to avoid trouble.
就像我之前說過的，這些貼文已經有段時間了，就我記憶所及，大概只能想起來我大概發了8到10篇。問題是，當他們對我提出告訴時，版主就會刪除這些文章來避免不必要的麻煩。
你的意思是說當這個訴訟開始進行的時候，那個論壇的版主就進行了刪文的動作嗎？
What you meant was when the lawsuit came to effect, the administrator will delete all the post?
Yes, that is correct.
沒錯。
也就是說，你完全沒有辦法確定你一共為此事件發表過幾篇文章？
That is you still aren’t that sure how many post you have posted upon this issue?
That’s correct, too.
也沒錯。
那就你記憶所及，你曾經接到過該公司任何希望你停止批評他們的要求嗎？你有照做嗎？
In your memory, did the company send you any requirement or warning to stop posting?
I think towards the end of my postings, I did get a request from Winwin, asking me to stop posting articles about their company. I didn’t stop immediately because, again, I was only asking questions.
在我停止發文之前，都沒有收到任何要我停止發文的消息。我沒有立即停止發文，因為就像我之前所說的，我只是在問問題而已。
所以你還是堅持，因為你都是用問題的方式來發表評論，並沒有直接毀謗該公司名譽的事實，是嗎？
So the defendant, you still insist that you are posting in the form of posting questions, instead of directly libeling the company to damage their reputation. Is that right?
It was never my intention to defame Winwin. I don’t quite understand how a series of questions could possibly constitute “defamation.”
我從來就沒有想過要妨害雙贏公司的名譽。我還是不太了解一連串的問題會構成妨害名譽或毀謗。
那請問告訴人，貴公司是什麼時候開始瞭解到，在「外國園地」當中，有關於貴公司的文章？
Next I will ask the plaintiff some questions. Plaintiff, when did you find that there are some comments about your company?

This issue first came to our attention around December 2019. My wife and I personally were not active in that kind of forums. We were only informed by some friends about the malicious comments on Foreign Land until then.
這些問題主要首次是在2019年12月我們有意識到。我跟我老婆一開始並沒有在這個論壇上很活躍。我們是在朋友跟我們告知有這些惡意的評論之後才意識到這件事情。
對於剛剛被告表示他只是提出一連串的問題，希望貴公司回答這些問題，並沒有以陳述方式毀謗貴公司的名譽。你有何意見？
The defendent said that he didn‘t he just wrote the comment in the form of asking questions instead of statements. About this, what’s your idea?

That’s not true. In English, even when comments are made in the question format, they still carry enough force to make readers wonder or question the facts implied by the questions. Even when the defendant said he only asked questions, damage was done to my company.
這不對。這在英文裡面，即使是用問題的形式，它也是有強力的作用去質疑事實。也就是說，當被告問了這些問題的時候，他對我們的公司就造成了毁謗、造成我們的名譽受損。
你的意思是說，不管對方是否用問題方式提出質疑，你們公司的名譽實際上都有所損害嗎？請解釋一下。
Can you make a further explanation that no matter the defendant used the question or not, your company...the reputation of your company is still damaged?

Yes, when the defendant asked those questions, it caused doubt and suspicion in the circle of foreigners in Taiwan. Foreigners form their own circle here in Taiwan and rumors travel fast. That’s why even the Labor Bureau paid several visits to our company, trying to find out if we were involved in the matters posted on Foreign Land.
沒錯，被告的確造成了一些質疑。公司的確受到損害了，因為這些謠言都已經傳遍了。台灣的勞工局也有來造訪我們，去試圖找出我們是否牽涉其中。
那勞工局前往貴公司瞭解外國人的雇用狀況，以及居留證的申請細節，有發現什麼不符合的地方嗎？
So when Labor Bureau went to visit your company and asked you about the your hiring and applying for ARC, are there any violations of your rule?
No, the representatives from the Bureau came but did not find anything wrong with our company or our hiring practice.
沒有，他們有過來探視但沒有發現任何問題，在申請上面都沒有問題。
如果勞工局的調查並沒有發現什麼不妥之處，或是違法之處，再加上剛剛被告也解釋，他撰寫這些文章的目的都只是希望貴公司能夠進行自清的動作，有沒有可能雙方進行和解呢？

If the Labor Bureau did not find anything wrong in your company. Furthermore, the aim of the defendant’s asking your question is to want to get your self-clarification; as a result, is there any chance for you to make a settlement?

We previously tried but failed to reach any conclusion. I would only consider settling this case with two things from the defendant. First, he has to formally apologize to Winwin for posting those inappropriate comments on Foreign Land. Second, as he said he heard all those details from “other foreign friends,” he should provide the names of those people to clear his own name.
我們之前有試過，但最後都沒有達到任何共識。我只對這個被告要求兩件事。第一件事情，我只希望他能公開道歉，說明他對外國園地的毀謗。第二，就像他說的，他是從其他人那邊聽到這些消息細節的，他應該要提供到底確切是從哪些人聽到的。
被告，就像剛剛告訴人所指出，如果要進行和解，他希望由你這邊採取兩個行動，第一，正式道歉，對於在外國園地所發表的文章，不論你的文章是否造成告訴人公司實質上的名譽受損，對方都希望你提出道歉。第二，你剛剛前面指出，你是從一些外國友人那邊，聽到告訴人公司有違法對待外國勞工之嫌，你可以提供這些友人的姓名嗎？

Defendant, as the accuser required, if you want to reach a settlement, you have to take the following two actions...the above mentioned two actions. First, you have to apologize formally. Regarding your posts on the Foreign Land, no matter you had caused damage to their reputation... As you mentioned before, you have heard these rumors from your foreign friends, and could you please provide those friends’ names, since you are suspected of violating defamation.

No, I would not consider these terms. First of all, I don’t know why I should apologize for posting some questions on the Internet. Since when is asking questions a crime? Second, Winwin cannot agree to settle the case with the term of obtaining names from me. This is not right.
不，我不會考慮以上兩個方式。首先，我還是不懂為什麼我只是問一些問題就要受到處罰。從什麼時候開始問問題變成一種罪？第二，雙贏公司並不同意要和解，若是我提供這些人的姓名。
如果被告堅持因為文章的書寫內容都是以問題的方式進行，並沒有要毀謗告訴人公司的意圖，這顯然在第一個部分，你就是拒絕道歉，是嗎？
The defendant you insist that you are writing these posts in the form of asking questions, so you refuse to apologize, right?
No, I will not consider making an apology.
不，我並不考慮要道歉。
對於告訴人的第二個要求，你也拒絕。是因為擔心告訴人公司會對那些人進行相關的法律訴訟，是嗎？
As for the second request of the accuser, do you worry that your foreign friends will be filed a lawsuit against?
The thing is that some of the friends used to or may be currently working for Winwin. How could I jeopardize them just for the sake of settling my own case? Why should they suffer the potential harm?
重點是，有些友人是曾經或是現在正在雙贏工作的。我怎麼忍心讓他們暴露在危險當中，只是為了要和解？為什麼他們要暴露在這些潛在的危險當中？
如果雙方無法就和解進行任何退讓，那麼法院這邊只能將這一次的準備程序內容進行彙整，以便進行下一次的審理程序。雙方的辯護人，是不是能夠針對和解這個選擇，再跟你們的當事人談一談呢？

The accuser if you don’t want to make any compromise against this settlement, we will gathering this information together to be the next court’s evidence. Today, the accuser and the defendant both have their lawyer. Regarding settlement, can both the lawyer talk to your client?
報告庭上，其實之前我們就有跟被告溝通，既然他說他的消息都是聽自其他友人，他大可以直接把那些人的名字提供給我們，而讓這一次的訴訟事件告一段落，但被告的態度一直很不合作，所以我們這邊也就無法進行進一步的和解動作。

Your Honor, I am the lawyer of the accuser. Your Honor, actually we have talked to the defendant before. Since the defendant obtained those details from his friends, Therefore, he can provide us the names of his friends and let the court to come to an end. However, the defendant is unwilling to cooperate with us, so the settlement cannot be made.
報告鈞院，其實我的當事人會有這樣的顧慮，最主要是因為告訴人公司雇用很多外國人士，我的當事人不希望因為提供友人姓名一事，而讓過去或目前為告訴人公司服務的外國人士，惹上不必要的麻煩。望請鈞院了解。

Your Honor, I’m the lawyer of the defendant. Actually, the concerns... the main concerns of my client is that your company has hired many of his friends. My client doesn’t hope to provide those names since those friends are...used to work in your company or currently work in your company, so he doesn’t want them to get into trouble. Your Honor, hope you can understand.
既然告訴人跟被告雙方對於和解都各自有堅持，本庭定中華民國109年8月14日上午11點整進行審理程序。
Since that both parties are hold their own insistence, so we will set the next court, the trial procedure on at 11 AM on August 14, 2020.
請問被告，有無需要法院進一步調查之證據？
The dependent, do you need any further investigation, the court can help you.
No, your honor.
不，沒有。
那告訴人這邊呢？
How about the accuser, do you want the court to help you investigate any evidence?
I will think about it. If anything comes up, I will ask my lawyer to place a request to the court.
讓我們再思考一下，如果需要的話我會請我的律師再跟庭上詢問。
那針對下一次的庭期，我們就不再發傳票，而是直接在庭直接以橘色小卡進行通知。請在簽完今天的筆錄後，領取小卡，再行離開。

About the next court, we will not send you any subpoena. Instead, we will send you the orange card for you. After you take your statement, you can get the orange card and go. So the procedure ends here.

The defendant, you are prosecuted by the prosecutor that on March 8th 2020, on the door of a 7-11 at the intersection of Xuefu Rd and Daxue Rd you stole a motorcycle which had the plate number BL-1234. I did not steal the motorcycle. On that day, it was rainy very hard. My friend and I did not bring an umbrella and we were in a hurry to get home. So, we decided to borrow the motorcycle. 我沒有偷那輛摩托車，那天，雨下得很大，我和我的朋友沒有帶傘，但是我們急著回家，所以我們決定「借用」一下那輛摩托車，我們有打算要還回去，真的，我們想說隔天把摩托車放回原來的地方，我們真的沒有要偷的意思。
沒有帶傘就可以偷人家車子嗎？

不行，但那天下大雨而且我趕著回家，我回國的飛機在明天就會到達，我知道我犯了大錯，感到非常抱歉。
為什麼會偷那部車子呢？我的意思是為什麼是那部，而不是別部車呢

I did not steal the motorcycle. On that day, it was rainy very hard. My friend and I did not bring an umbrella and we were in a hurry to get home. So, we decided to borrow the motorcycle. 沒有帶傘就可以偷人家車子嗎？
